title: Play Hustle City Episode One for free, trainer based video game sprints to preorder release
content:
Will Baldwin is about to take to the streets. Well, a virtual Will Baldwin will be riding on virtual streets as the main character in Hustle City – the latest way to make your trainer rides more fun. Just a few months ago, Hustle City announced that they were aiming to launch the full game […]

The post Play Hustle City Episode One for free, trainer based video game sprints to preorder release appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
